summary.p: A complete text (mūlam) of the Naiṭatam, with an unpublished commentary from preface to end.
Description based on the digital images available on Gallica.

collation.desc: 1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
337 folios = Naiṭatam: Text & Commentary. Tamil foliation 1-337. Verso blank.

foliation.p: Foliation in Tamil and European numbers.

binding.p: Ebony woodcovers, seemingly made at the instance of Ducler, after he acquired the manuscript.

origin.origDate: Internally dated to the year kara of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1831-1832, 1771-1772, 1711-1712, etc. See colophon (U3, f337r6). Dated to circa 1770 by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) and to 1770 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments).

acquisition.p: Acquired, July 22nd, 1833, from Philippe Ducler. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1833-1848, no. 86.

taḻaiviri kaṭukkai mālai taṉimutaṟ caṭaiyiṟ cūṭuṅ kuḻaviveṇ ṭiṅka ḷitta kōṭṭatu kuṟaiyeṉ ṟeṇṇi puraineṭuṅ karattārp paṟṟip poṟpuṟa yiṇaittu
nōkku maḻaimatak kaḷittiṉ ceyya malaraṭi ceṉṉi vaippām ~ Etu ~ taḻainaṟu malarnta pūṅkoṉṟai mālaiyiṉaiyuṭaiya civaṉāṉavar caṭāyārttilē ya
ṇintukoṇṭirukkiṉṟa viḷaveṇpiṟaiyiṉai muṉṉē tāṉ pāratameḻututaṟkut taṉ kompilē yōṭitta kuṟaiyāka niṉaintu yataṉait tuḷaiporu
ntiya neṭitākiya tutikkaiyiṉālē yeṭuttut taṉkompiṉuṭaiya kuṟaiyilē yaḻakupeṟa vaittu yōṭip pātamaṟṟaik kompiṉo
teytu cariyāyiruppatu pārttaruḷiya malai pōlu matacelaṅkaḷaip poḻiyāniṉṟirukkiṉṟa yāṉai mukattaṉākiya vikkiṉēcuraṉu
ṭaiya centāmarai malarpōṉṟa pātaṅkaḷai yematu talaimēṟ koḷvāmeṉṟavāṟu 1

karuvi māmaḻai kalaimaka ḷuruveṉa viḷaṅki yiruvi cumpiṭai parantuceṉ ṟiṉṉamaṇi kōḻikkum paravai veṇṭirai mēyntuyar paṉivarai yuyir
tta vuruva vōṭarit taṭaṅkaṇā ḷurukkoṭu mīṇṭa ~ Etu ~ peritāyirukiṉṟa mēkaṅkaḷ caracuvatiyiṉuṭaiya vuruvam pōlē veṇmaiyāyat
tōṉṟivittāramāyirukku mākācamāṟkamākap paṭarntu pōy navaraṟṟiṉaṅkaḷaik kōḻikkuñ camuttirattiṉuṭaiya veṇmaiyāyirukki
ṉṟa valaikaḷaip paraṉam paṇṇiyuyarcci poruntiya yimappaṟuvatam peṟṟa vaḻukiya cevvari paṭarnta taṭaṅkaṇkaḷaiyuṭaiya yu
maiyava ḷuruvam pōla nīlavaṟaṉamākit tirumpivantaṉa veṉṟavāṟu 1

Āḻi cūḻpavi muḻuvatu māḻiyoṉ ṟuṟuṭṭi
vāḻi nallaṟam puritaruṅ kampalam vāṟṟi cūḻi mālvaraip piṭaruṟu cumaiyoḻit tāṟa pāḻi yampuyat tulakelām parittaṉi
tiruntāṉ Etu Anta naḷaccakiṟavaṟtiyāṉavaṉ piṉṉuñ camuttiñ cūḻunta pūlōkamellān taṉṉuṭaiya vāka?ṉucakka
rañ celutti naṉmai tarukiṉṟa vekutaṟamaṅkaḷaic ceytu kiṭaippa taṟakaritākiya vēkuyarkātikiṟutukkaḷaic ceyvittu mukapa
ṭarttai yaṇintu periyamalai pōlirukkaṉṟatikāṉaiyiṉ piṭariyilē yirukkiṉṟa pūmiparāccumaiyai yiṟakkivalu
mai peṟṟaḻukitāyirukkiṉṟa taṉṉuṭaiya tōḷilē yantaccumaiyai vaittulakamellā mirēṭcittuk ko
